channel.title: [Med/Large request] Need 24 images re-sized and another 24 made
channel.description:
Okay from the title this sound like a HUGE task.
It's not as big as you think, or at least I don't think so.
I need 24 icons scaled to 30 x 30. They are no bigger than 60 x 60. From those re-sized images, I need 24 duplicates, but with a red X like the runescape doomsayer warning had.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/lHr044H.png?1[/img] ^That's the X I'm talking about.
[url=http://imgur.com/a/2DNkX]Here are the images I need re-sized.[/url]. Note: I accidentally put of one icon. My bad.
Edit: [img]http://puu.sh/9MUtd/7aa2130586.jpg[/img] ^Is why I need them rezised and done properly. That's how it looks when I try to resize it myself.

item.title: [Med/Large request] Need 24 images re-sized and another 24 made
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I_Hybrid_I:

I don’t get it, do you want us to rescale the images to 30x30? Just with the same text on it?

No…

I need the 24 skill icons I linked in the album resized to 30x30. If they’re not resized properly it will leave a pinkish purple area around the icon that’s visible in game.

And then I need 24 new images based on the ones you resized. They’re the exact same things, but with a red X (like the doomsayer warning X I show in the picture) over it.

In total, it’s 48 images. But technically most of it is done.

Read full topic
item.source: [Med/Large request] Need 24 images re-sized and another 24 made
